Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to subjecting owners who knew or should have known about an alteration in violation of the uniform code to a civil penalty
Summary: Relates to subjecting owners who knew or should have known about an alteration in violation of the uniform code to a civil penalty; subjects owners to up to a seven thousand five hundred dollar penalty when the alteration to the building violated the uniform code and impeded a person's egress from the building during an evacuation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to subjecting owners who knew or should have known about an alteration in violation of the uniform code to a civil penalty
